price: (30) And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allāh].
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymāna niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
